title: The Ping Is GODLIKE
body: Seriously i live in Perth (Murdoch to be exact) and my normal ping is like 80-200 and sometimes 500 when lag spikes happens. Today i  got a 4000 ping  and the lag was insane. Lucky that was a beginner bots match and not a normal pvp game. Well i heard that riot is looking into the ping issue but seriously it is not working and the ping is GODLIKE so please shut it down asap.

replies.body: I wish they'd just shut off the servers until they fixed it. It would allow them to pinpoint the problem much faster.
That may be true if they know whats wrong with the server. Well it seems that the ping issue got worse after the 5.8 patch ...
